scripts.test: yarn run test_core && yarn run test_agency && yarn run test_hq
scripts.build_travel: cd apps/travel && ember build --env production && echo `TZ=US/Pacific date` > dist/build_timestamp.txt && rm -rf dist/dist.zip; zip -q -r dist/dist.zip dist
scripts.build: yarn run test && yarn run build_travel && yarn run build_agency
scripts.watch: yarn run watch_travel & yarn run watch_agency & yarn run watch_agency_devserver
scripts.build_ios: yarn run build_travel && mkdir -p native/ios/www && cp apps/travel/dist/dist.zip native/ios/www;
